Uses of Package
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download

Packages that use com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download Contains utilities for downloading bitmaps and binding them to ImageView or any widget which can display a Bitmap. 
 

Classes in com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download used by com.smartnsoft.droid4me.download
BasisBitmapDownloader
          An implementation of the CoreBitmapDownloader class, which is independent from the Android platform.
BasisBitmapDownloader.DownloadBitmapCommand
           
BasisDownloadInstructions
          Gathers in one place the download instructions contracts used by BitmapDownloader.
BasisDownloadInstructions.InputStreamDownloadInstructor
          When the input stream related to an bitmap needs to be downloaded asynchronously, this interface enables to indicate it, and to notify the owner when the input stream has been actually downloaded.
BasisDownloadInstructions.Instructions
          Enables the bitmap downloader to know on how to handle a command.
BasisDownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions
           
BitmapDownloader
          A first implementation of the CoreBitmapDownloader class.
CoreBitmapDownloader
          Responsible for downloading the bitmaps in dedicated threads and to bind them to Android Views.
CoreBitmapDownloader.UsedBitmap
           
DownloadContracts.Bitmapable
          An abstraction of a Bitmap which makes possible the writing of unitary tests.
DownloadContracts.Handlerable
          An abstraction of a android.os.Handle which makes possible the writing of unitary tests.
DownloadContracts.Viewable
          An abstraction of a View which makes possible the writing of unitary tests.
DownloadInstructions.BitmapableBitmap
          An implementation of the DownloadInstructions.BitmapableBitmap interface specific to the Android platform.
DownloadInstructions.Instructions
          Enables the bitmap downloader to know on how to handle a command.
DownloadInstructions.SimpleInstructions
          A very simple implementation of the DownloadInstructions.Instructions, which by-passes the persistence option.
DownloadInstructions.ViewableView
          An implementation of the DownloadContracts.Viewable interface specific to the Android platform.
DownloadSpecs.TemporaryImageSpecs
          Enables to express an image specification with a default image resource identifier, in case the URL does not correspond to an image.
